pages.text: $(li)The Ancient Tome Sweeping Edge can be used to upgrade an enchanted item with Sweeping Edge III enchantment to level IV.$(br)$(li)To apply this enchant, you need to place the desired item and the ancient tome in an Anvil while you have at least 30 levels.
pages.title: A.T. Sweeping Edge IV
